call_summary.final_outcome: The receptionist completed an intake for a new mold damage case and attempted to transfer the caller to staff; however, the receptionist returned to the line to inform the caller the firm could not accept the case and provided a referral to another attorney.

transfer_context.description: The receptionist attempted to transfer the caller to someone who could assist further with the mold case inquiry, but returned to the line after the transfer failed to connect.
